questions: Q. 1. Name any one river valley project which has significantly contributed to the loss of forests. [Board Term-I, Term-I,  2014]
Q. 2. Write the major sour ce of fresh water in India ?
Q. 3. How much percent of the total volume of world’s water is estimated to exist as fresh water ?
Q. 4. What percentage of the total volume of world’s water is estimated to exist as oceans ?
Q. 5. What are the causes of water scarcity ?
answers: Ans. Rapid growth of population, uneven distribution of water resources and increase in demand of water.

questions: Q. 6. Which largest artificial lake was built in 11 th century ?
Q. 7. On which river has the Hirakud Dam been constructed ?
Q. 8. On which river ‘Bhakhra Nangal Dam’ has been constructed ?
Q. 9. Who proclaimed dams as the temple of mod ern India ?
Q. 10. Which river is known as the ‘River of Sorrow’ ?
Q. 11. Name two social movements which were against the multi purpose projects.
answers: Ans. Narmada Bachao Andolan and Tehri Dam Andolan.

questions: Q. 12. The Nagarjuna Sagar Dam is built on which river ?
Q. 13. On which river the Salal Dam is built ?
Q. 14. In which regions the release of water from dams during heavy rains aggravated the flood situation in 2006 ?
